pages.text: Here you will learn to master amethyst totems and their abilities. To begin:$(li)$(li) with some soul energy, giving it the ability to look after you.

amethyst_imbuement:golden_heart.text: First find a $(item)Heart of the Sea$() and craft it into a $(l:amethyst_imbuement:recipes/recipes)Golden Heart$()

amethyst_imbuement:crystalline_heart.text: Next imbue that heart into a $(l:amethyst_imbuement:imbuing/crystalline_heart)Crystalline Heart$()

amethyst_imbuement:totem.text: With a now-pulsing heart in hand, you can craft your $(l:amethyst_imbuement:recipes/)Totem of Amethyst$()

amethyst_imbuement:arcane_researcher.text: Find and read Lore Books scattered around the world to start adding more powerful spells to your magical arsenal.

amethyst_imbuement:progression/tier_1_sc.text: Begin your journey on an upgrade path by continuing onto the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:starter_guide/scepter_upgrading)Scepter Upgrade Guide$()

pages.text: $(li)$(li)Once crafted, apply an appropriate Augment to grant yourself powerful passive and active abilities!$(br2)$(l)Note: Totems can have one passive $(o)and$() $(l)one active augment at a time!$()
